basics.summary: I am a Linux Server Administrator located in Philippines.

education.institution: Technological University of the Philippines - Cavite, Cavite, PH

work.summary: L1-L2 server technician for Dev/UAT/Prod servers
highlights: Part of the Global command center that is based in Sandy, US
Respond to tickets raised from event monitoring and incidents logged by users.
Performs set of tasks needed to be done in the operating system based on client scope
Engagement on high priority tickets that needs fast resolution.

work.summary: L1-L2 desktop technician for client and internal employees
highlights: On-site IT Technician of Workstation and Network infrastructures (WAN and LAN) in 2 office branches in Manila
Installing Workstations (Windows, Fedora, and Ubuntu: Desktops and Laptops) by configuring, testing and maintaining Operating Systems with Application Software and System Tools.
Resolving Helpdesk Ticket issues as Level 1 and 2 Tier Support or Escalate to NOC/Systems Team.

work.summary: L1 desktop technician/reporting specialist for a small BPO company
highlights: Resolving Network/Desktop/PBX issues and other IT concerns
Operating, and overseeing in and out data transfer to ZOHO CRM
Managing and configuring IP PBX server for client call-outs.
Daily Reporting of Agents Productivity, Call History and Call Recordings
Managing and  operating all CentOS MTA (Mail Transfer Agent) servers for email blast

work.summary: IT Support in an engineering company
highlights: Designing, enhancing and installing Network Infrastructures of Gatepacific circuits upon transferring to PEZA-zoned office.
Installation and maintenance of all laptops, desktops, server and VOIP systems inside and outside (field projects) of the company.
Managing and Creating user accounts to Microsoft Office 365.
Managing and configuring IP PBX servers to handle incoming client calls
